Name: boost
Description: 0 Hz Boost in digit. 1000 digit ~ 2.5%

Name: fweak
Description: Frequency where V/Hz reaches its peak

Name: fpconst
Description: Frequency where slip frequency is derated to form a constant power region. Only has an effect when < fweak

Name: fslipmin
Description: Slip frequency at minimum throttle

Name: fslipmax
Description: Slip frequency at maximum throttle

Name: polepairs
Description: Pole pairs of motor (4-pole motor: 2 pole pairs)

Name: ampmin
Description: Relative sine amplitude at minimum throttle

Name: encflt
Description: Filter constant between pulse encoder and speed calculation. Makes up for slightly uneven pulse distribution

Name: fmin
Description: Below this frequency no voltage is generated

Name: fmax
Description: At this frequency slip is commanded 0 to avoid further acceleration

Name: pwmfrq
Description: PWM frequency. 0=17.6kHz, 1=8.8kHz, 2=4.4kHz, 3=2.2kHz

Name: pwmpol
Description: PWM polarity. 0=active high, 1=active low. DO NOT PLAY WITH THIS!

Name: deadtime
Description: Deadtime between highside and lowside pulse. 28=800ns, 56=1.5µs. Not always linear, consult STM32 manual

Name: numimp
Description: Pulse encoder pulses per turn

Name: potmin
Description: Value of "pot" when pot isn't pressed at all

Name: potmax
Description: Value of "pot" when pot is pushed all the way in

Name: pot2min
Description: Value of "pot2" when regen pot is in 0 position

Name: pot2max
Description: Value of "pot2" when regen pot is in full on position

Name: idlespeed
Description: Motor idle speed. Set to -100 to disable idle function.

Name: speedkp
Description: Speed controller gain (Cruise and idle speed). Decrease if speed oscillates. Increase for faster load regulation

Name: cruisemode
Description: 0=button (set when button pressed, reset with brake pedal), 1=switch (set when switched on, reset when switched off or brake pedal)

Name: speedflt
Description: Filter before cruise controller

Name: bmslimhigh
Description: Positive throttle limit on BMS under voltage

Name: bmslimlow
Description: Regen limit on BMS over voltage

Name: brknompedal
Description: Foot on break pedal regen torque

Name: brknom
Description: Regen padel travel

Name: brkmax
Description: Foot-off regen torque

Name: brkrampstr
Description: Below this frequency the regen torque is reduced linearly with the frequency

Name: udcsw
Description: Voltage at which the DC contactor is allowed to close

Name: udcmin
Description: Low voltage at which a voltage warning light comes on

Name: udcmax
Description: High voltage at which a voltage warning light comes on

Name: udclim
Description: High voltage at which the PWM is shut down

Name: ocurlim
Description: Hardware over current limit. RMS-current times sqrt(2) + some slack

Name: minpulse
Description: Narrowest or widest pulse, all other mapped to full off or full on, respectively

Name: il1gain
Description: Digits per A of current sensor L1

Name: il2gain
Description: Digits per A of current sensor L2

Name: udcgain
Description: Digits per V of DC link

Name: pwmfunc
Description: Quantity that controls the PWM output. 0=tmpm, 1=tmphs, 2=speed

Name: pwmgain
Description: Gain of PWM output

Name: pwmofs
Description: Offset of PWM output, 4096=full on

Name: snshs
Description: Heatsink temperature sensor. 0=JCurve, 1=Semikron (Skiip82)

Name: snsm
Description: Motor temperature sensor. 2=KTY83-110, 3=KTY84-130

Name: fslipspnt
Description: Slip setpoint in mode 2. Written by software in mode 1

Name: ampnom
Description: Nominal amplitude in mode 2. Written by software in mode 1

Name: version
Description: Firmware version

Name: opmode
Description: Operating mode. 0=Off, 1=Run, 2=Manual_run

Name: udc
Description: DC link voltage

Name: idc
Description: Calculated DC current

Name: il1
Description: AC current L1

Name: il2
Description: AC current L2

Name: il1rms
Description: RMS current L1

Name: il2rms
Description: RMS current L2

Name: fstat
Description: Stator frequency

Name: speed
Description: Motor speed

Name: amp
Description: Sine amplitude, 37813=max

Name: pot
Description: Pot value, 4095=max

Name: pot2
Description: Regen Pot value, 4095=max

Name: potnom
Description: Scaled pot value, 0 accel

Name: dir
Description: Rotation direction. -1=REV, 0=Neutral, 1=FWD

Name: tmphs
Description: Heatsink temperature

Name: tmpm
Description: Motor temperature

Name: din_cruise
Description: Cruise Control. This pin activates the cruise control with the current speed. Pressing again updates the speed set point.

Name: din_start
Description: State of digital input "start". This pin starts inverter operation

Name: din_brake
Description: State of digital input "brake". This pin sets maximum regen torque (brknompedal). Cruise control is disabled.

Name: din_mprot
Description: State of digital input "motor protection switch". Shuts down the inverter when =0

Name: din_forward
Description: Direction forward

Name: din_reverse
Description: Direction backward

Name: din_emcystop
Description: State of digital input "emergency stop". Shuts down the inverter when =0

Name: din_ocur
Description: Over current detected

Name: din_bms
Description: BMS over voltage/under voltage

Name: tm_meas
Description: Time taken to calculate new duty cycle in PWM service routine

Name: brkout
Description: Trigger brake light independently from braking

Name: idlethrotlim
Description: Depends on you gearing and motor

Name: syncmode
Description: Experimental: Running synchronous motors

Name: syncofs
Description: Experimental: Configure a pin as an input for the north marker. When the interrupt fires, reset the angle

Name: chargemode
Description: Charging mode. 0=Off, 3=Boost, 4=Buck

Name: chargecur
Description: Hardware over current limit
